https://tmrev.io/movie/962206-Behind the Action: Stuntmen in the Movies 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null This short documentary was first shown on the Turner Classic Movies (TCM) cable channel. Stuntmen specializing in various fields discuss their craft and explain the planning, execution, and safety aspects of the stunts they perform. Behind the Action: Stuntmen in the Movies
